name: Conjuror
description:
It's Game -A-Week 5, baybee!

Conjuror is a ~15-minute rpg.

The combat system is definitely lacking in polish, but I'm happy with how it's progressing. Let me know your thoughts!

Next week's theme is growth.

CONTROLS

Z - Interact/Confirm

X - Cancel/Jump

C - Menu/Swap party member position

Arrow Keys - Move
